sentences: Kontrollkomisjoni aktis oli märgitud mitu olulist puudujääki.
context: The Estonian word 'akt' has multiple meanings depending on context: 1) An action or deed (military, political, intentional, etc.); 2) A legal document that fixes a juridical fact; 3) A file or folder containing documents related to a particular matter; 4) In art, a depiction of the nude human figure; 5) Historically/literarily, an act (as in a play). The word can refer to both concrete actions and formal documents recording those actions.
